lines.text: I think Eminem should relax a little. I mean, my mom's a bitch too, but I don't sing songs about it.
You shot the Easter Bunny!
He made a menacing gesture at me!
I think he was trying to give you an egg!
Why is the Easter Bunny even here, Conan? It's not Easter!
I don't know, he just likes to hang around the studio sometimes!
My daughter asked me why, when we're walking down the street together, people who walk by us say "Training Day".
Yeah, my daughter asked me, "Daddy, why do people walk by us and say, 'That guy's not funny?'"
[after Uma Thurman tells him that she sometimes eats in the nude]
I tried that once, but I was kicked out of Denny's.
Let's check in with the 'Men Without Hats Conversation Channel.'
Do you want toast?

[to the tune of "The Safety Dance"]
You can make toast if you want to, and leave your friends behind. 'Cause your friends don't toast, and if they don't toast, then they're no friends of mine.
I want a divorce.
[leaves]
We can get divorced if you want to, and leave your friends behind...
Are you all finished? Should I bring you the check?
You can bring the check if you want to, and bring the check right now. 'Cause your friends don't check, and if they don't check...
[Waitor socks Man in the face]
[after learning he can't jump out of a truck, and must only step out]
When will the government get off our backs? We're truckers', dammit!
[quietly]
I wanna live.
No, that's not possible!
You're not possible!

Then I cornered the earthquake and I grabbed it by its ass and zen I pressed against ze earthquake's perky 19-year-old faultlines. Zen the earthquake said, "I thought you hired me for my skills." And I just laughed at ze earthquake. Zen ze earthquake ran out crying and zen I turned slowly to camera, took the cigar out of my mouth and said, "Now she's all shook up."
I would be suspicious of someone like me.
Have you ever had Fruity Pebbles? Once that stuff hits milk, it turns into a narcotic!
My producer says no, but I'm doing it anyway, because it's "Late Night with..." who?
If you were going to fill Lake Ontario with chicken broth, how much chicken broth would you need?... That's a trick question. Why would anyone do that? You are doing very well here, sir.
The nightmare is that you spend the rest of your life being funny at parties, then people ask you, "Why didn't you do that on television?"

You see, you're in for a long lifetime of, "And you went to Harvard?" Accidentally give the wrong amount of change in a transaction and it's, "And you went to Harvard?" Ask the guy at the hardware store how there jumper cables work and here, "And you went to Harvard?" Forget just once that your underwear goes inside your pants and it's, "And you went to Harvard?" Get your head stuck in your niece's doll house because you wanted to see what it was like to be a giant and it's, "Uncle Conan, you went to Harvard?"
Conan, what's your position on gay marriage?
Well, Max, I don't really know.
What do you mean?
I'm not sure, I have to think about it.
You don't deserve me, you bastard.
I should come to rehearsals. I would have taken that one out. But I'm sleeping.
I just noticed from your waist there... you're speckled all over.
Almost, Jeff Goldblum. Almost.
Intelligence reports say that Osama bin Laden's personal physician has been successfully captured. Right now, the Army is also attempting to capture his dentist and his Pilates instructor.

[on living in L.A]
You get critters in your house, like a lot of spiders and ants and creatures. You know, you go to sleep and... The other night I could feel things crawling around in my bed and I flicked on the light and there's Barry Manilow and David Hasselhoff!
I hope this is to promote the movie.
This is just me being comfortable.
We got a good show tonight. Right, Max?
Absolutely, Conan.
Not a sincere bone in his body.

[after crashing his bicycle]
That bicycle hates freedom.

[mocking a crowd response]
Yay, illiteracy!
I'm sorry. I didn't get enough attention as a child and now America has to pay. Because my mom had six kids, America has to pay!

[while doing 'In the Year 2000']
The former sidekick of Late Night with Conan O'Brien will return to do the 'Year 2000' comedy piece, realize that the year 2000 was actually four years ago and remember why he left this crappy show.
I had a little baby girl about eleven months ago and named her Neve...
Hmm, interesting.
Yeah, my way of getting to you. You wouldn't return my calls so I name my child after you, still no calls.
[shouts]
What do you want?
[while playing 1864 baseball, Conan spots a passing plane]
What, ho! What is that? Demonry?
[while playing with the Toronto Maple Leafs, Conan introduces a much wider hockey net]

Guys, as we all know, scoring is difficult. This is the approved NHL four-by-six hockey net. I give you the "Conan net" right here. It will revolutionize the game. Bigger scores, more attendance. In this version of the game, the goalie, on odd-numbered nights, would be allowed to have a piece of furniture with him to help. An ottoman, a recliner, or a small sectional. Not a *large* sectional.
[pause]
It's not a circus.
I'm 6'4" and I have the voice of a nine-year old.
Whether you're
[gestures to himself]
Christian...
[gestures to Max]
or Jewish or...
[looks at La Bamba and pauses]
... whatever YOU'RE into...
I'm John Kerry, and I'm...
Reporting.
Reeeeeeeporrrrrrrrrrrrtinnnnngggggg...
For.
Fooooooorrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr...
Duty.
Duuuuuuuuuuuuuuuutyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy!
My name is Bill Clinton, and I'm reporting for booty.
I love you, Conan!
I love you too, sir.
This just in from CBS News - the Earth has hurtled into the sun.
You know, your hair looks redder on TV. It's really brown in person.
You know what it is? It's the lighting here. And now we're talking about something *important* for a change! This is what the country cares about! They don't care about the election!

[after LaBamba gets up and walks out]
"Where are you going, LaBamba? You don't have a home."
[Conan is playing 1864 baseball]
Now, let's get back out there and show that other team why our life expectancy is only thirty nine years.
This year there will be more cutting edge political wit and satire, and less random arbitrary humour that doesn't make sense. Isn't that right, Fidel Castro Rabbit DJ?
[the aforementioned character agrees from behind his turntables]

[commenting on NBC being in 4th place in channel ranking, but NBC Late Night programmes being in 1st place]
Primetime's in the toilet, but Late Night's rockin'n'rollin'.

["In the Year 2000" prediction]
50 million viewers will tune in to watch the series finale of Friends, where it is finally revealed that New York has black people.
Isn't that right, Cactus Chef playing Billy Joel's "We Didn't Start the Fire" on a flute?
So... Ozzy, what's your favorite food?

[pause]
... Cottage cheese.

[about the Evil Puppy]
I'LL HAVE YOUR SOULS! And some Kibble...
[repeated line]
Keep cool my babies!
[frequently sung by Conan after making a mean joke that shocks the audience]
I'm-a gonna go to hell when I die. I'm-a gonna go to hell when I die.
I am a Pimpbot. It is within my program to turn out all the hos.
Now as I mentioned in the monologue, or as I like to call it- quiet time...
All the bitches think I'm pretty. Bought my face at Circuit City.
I kid, Conan, I kid. You got a good show... For me to poop on.
[Hollywood Secrets]
I'm the one nailing Mrs. Hopkins.
[Hollywood Secrets]
I'm superstitious. Whenever I start a new movie I kill a hobo with a hammer.
Ben and J-Lo have announced that they want a small wedding. Yeah. So they decided to invite all the people who saw GIGLI.
[discussing Zoltan Hargitay, brother of Mariska Hargitay]
Zoltan, you have greatly offended the Council of Nine.

[on what would happen if he were in congress]
Punch. Punch. Bite. Rape. Jail.
Queen Amidala. Queen Amidala. Nee-ha. Queen Amidala.

Chocolate Lucky Charms]
I ate six bowls, and I got high!
All this horseback riding has made me hungry, but not for food!
I am an albino jackass.
Abraham Lincoln was human garbage! It took him five years to win da Civil War. I could have won it in two days with my army of unstoppable cyborgs from the future!
Conan, I once had a bad experience with same-sex marriage. When I was a kid, I once caught my daddy in bed with a George Washington impersonator.
Uh, Mr. President, that wasn't a George Washington impersonator, that was your mother.
Conan, you're a liar! Everybody knows my mother looks like the Quaker Oats guy.

[about lizard]
He tried to bite me!
I forgot to mention... he bites.
You're an ass.
What is this, sir?
A little snow and ice.
A little snow and ice? Do you think Canada needs *more* snow and ice? I don't think so!
If the C-man's not happy, show don't go down!
Some audience members waiting in line to get into the building were smoking joints. Yeah, they said, "We want Conan to be funny whether he's funny or not."

[on leopard print G-strings]
That's what I wear. I enjoy them. I'm wearing one now.

[whispering]
Someone, start my car. Keep the engine running. This audience is getting mad.
We got the latest on the presidential election. I know that's why you tuned in. Or you couldn't sleep. And all the other channels were blocked.
My impressions are weird and useless.
'I'm sensitive in the eyeball'. Does that line work with the ladies?
Mein Führer! I could never have your skills! I've disappointed you, mein Führer!
Arnold, are you having a bad trip?
No, it's a good trip.
So, you called Cruz Bustamante and agreed that it was a fair election? That was very professional of you, Governor.
Ya! Zen I called him a fat little chipmunk! I said he should change his name to Lose Bustyourpantski, zen I had sex with his mother!
What?
Ya!

[changing Conan's opinion on what is the dumbest thing ever]
Wait a minute! Have you ever woken your grandmother up at three in the morning and smashed her in the face with a canoe?
That's maybe my subtext.
Do you wear this when you go to the beach, a European speedo?
I'll go with a high thong.
I have my fashionable zipper boot on.
...whoever replaces Ruben Studdard has some pretty big pants to fill. Now...
[pause]
Big fat man. Now... But wonderful voice, wonderful voice...
[small pause]
Fat.
Now, I am fascinated by celebrities. I mean, they're smart, they're good-looking, they're successful...
[gesturing to himself]
Sometimes all three, mama!

[referring to Simon Cowell]
I always wondered what would happen if you blow-dried the "Weakest Link" chick and cut off her nuts.
[after uproarious applause]
Calm down, people. The show's just not that good.
Consider yourself fisted by freedom!
What liquid was Han Solo frozen in?
Carbonite!
Oh, no, I'm sorry, the answer is, who gives a shit?
[in response to his use of the f-word to a senator]
From now on, the only f-word we'll be using is "freedom". You got that, fucker?
My tears make me strong. I'm... such an ass.
Mel Gibson wrote a children's book. It's called "Jesus Christ and the Terrible Horrible No Good Very Bad Day".
A lot of people seemed to like President Bush's speech last night.
Noooooo!
No?
It was garbage! No-one even watched it!
What do you mean no-one watched it?
They were too busy watching my convention speech again! It's now available on DVD!
Oh, wait. You mean to say you put your convention speech on a DVD?
Yah, I expanded it into a full-length feature by adding deleted scenes and there's some new explosions, and I even added a commentary track by me!
What? Your DVD has you doing a commentary track?

Yah, yah! It's filled with insightful comments I made during the speech! Comments like 'Look! That's me!' and 'Oh, this is a good speech!' and 'Oh, check out the jugs on that delegate from Rhode Island'!
Okay, you shouldn't do that. That's not good.
Plus, Conan, there's more! There's *more*!
Really? There's more?
Yah, there's an alternate ending to the speech! Where my speech fights with George Bush's speech on the surface of Mars!
The two speeches fight?

The two speeches collide in a never-before-seen conglomeration of speeches! My speech on the surface it tears into George Bush's speech, rips it into shreds and I turn to the camera and I say, "I'm speechless!"

I'm going to get me some of that holy oil because it was really good smelling stuff. They should be promoting it on the air and doing commercials for it. "Sweet holy oil. After a tough work out - ding-ding, ding-ding, ahhh! Nice!"
That IS how they talk in England! "Where's Chitty Chitty Bang Bang, gov'nor?"
You say "or-eh-gano", we say "ore-gah-no". You say "tom-ay-to", we say "tom-ah-to". You say "erb", and we say "herb" because there's a fucking "h" at the beginning.
You guys like Conan? He's hung like a horse, you know. A horse named My Little Pony!
I saw someone's beautiful wife and baby backstage. That is the cutest little girl! And the baby's cute too.
Yeah, my wife is eleven.
After Bill O'Reilly's accusation for sexual molestation, the ratings for his show have doubled. And with that in mind, I'd like to say, Max, you have a sweet ass.

[emerging from the audience]
Conan, Conan, stop!
God?
Yes, my s...
[trips on a wire]

[improvising]
Have you been drinking, God?
What would be a good name for me?
London.
There's a tunnel between Paris and London.
[covers his mouth]
Never piss off a hawk with a blow gun.

[warning Schwarzenegger that he can't carry out all his world-conquering "cyber-clones" plans]
But Arnold, you can't do that... the constitution...

[interrupts]
Cyber-clones eat constitutions!
[In response to the audience's applause to the Fantastic 4 Movie]
[in geek voice]
Hurray! Any super-hero movie!
I spent the weekend reading the new Harry Potter book.
Oh, really? How did you like it?
Well, Conan, so far the first three pages have been awesome.

[after a diminutive killer robot vaporizes a coffee mug on his table during a comedy bit]
Ladies and gentlemen... the crappiest special effect in the history of "Late Night".
[cheers and applause]

[singing]
Cat Accountants! Cat Accountants! Cat Accountants! Cat Accountants. They get taxes done in a hurry! They're as competent as they are furry. Cat Accountants! Cat Accountants! Cat Accountants! Cat Accountants! W-2s and 1099s are pieces of cake for these brilliant felines! Cat Accountants! Cat Accountants! Cat Accountants!
Hey, boss!
Yeah?
I just figured out something about a salad.
What's that?
If you throw it against the wall
[tosses bowl of salad against wall]
some of it sticks. Where's my paycheck?
Hey and where's mine?
[tosses bowl of salad against wall]
Yeah!

[Conan is having a conversation with Connery on the phone, and Connery asked Conan what his favorite Connery James Bond movie is]
I don't know... On Her Majesty's Secret Service.
That was George Lazenby! Nobody mistakes me for George Lazenby!
[pause]
Except for Mrs. Lazenby.
I have a golden retriever. It... retrieves.
...Is it golden?
You will die alone.
[David Bowie "Secrets"]
I don't know how many times someone has come up to me and said "Hey, let's dance!" I hate dancing. God it's stupid!
Oh God, I'm falling! And someone put me in a kayak!
Michael, were you surprised by the jury's innocent verdict?
Mm-hmm. That's right Conan, I never thought 12 adults could get me off.

[about the Evil Puppy]
He's evil! Trust me... I know...

[singing]
I'ma gonna go to hell when I die. I'ma gonna go to hell when I die.
[audience cheers]
Don't cheer that!

[Repeated line after a female audience member calls out that she loves him]
I love you too, sir.
You catch you child swearing. Do you wash his mouth out with soap? Or do you sit him down and explain that he'd better not fucking do it again? I think you know what to do.
What made you go down to Chinatown?
I just love it. I love "culture", man. Daddy digs a little sweet 'n' sour culture.
I gotta ask you, do you ever get your arthritic grandparents and take 'em out on the lawn and drag 'em around to rake the leaves?
How dare you rape me with your lunges!

[on the background curtains]
I love the little stars here. Every night when I watch your show I look at all the speckles in the sky. And if you squint just right, just right, it almost looks like those little, cute little dots on Morgan Freeman's face.

[after hearing there is no pineapple shrub]
Maybe that's why that old lady said "Stop spraying whipped cream on my bushes, you bastard!"

[about renouncing Satan at his daughter's baptism]
I wish I had sprouted devil wings and said, "I do not! I'll be baaaack!" and gone off to my mountain lair.
